propDescriptions.color: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component.
propDescriptions.error: If true, the input will indicate an error. The prop defaults to the value (false) inherited from the parent FormControl component.
propDescriptions.maxRows: Maximum number of rows to display.
propDescriptions.minRows: Minimum number of rows to display.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.

slotDescriptions.endDecorator: The component used to render the end decorator.
slotDescriptions.root: The component used to render the root.
slotDescriptions.startDecorator: The component used to render the start decorator.
slotDescriptions.textarea: The component used to render the textarea.
